About Us

As all of us know that it is not easy to find regional pandits for pooja & religious functions in today's fast life. Our company, Navgraha Pandit, situated at Malad West, Mumbai, Maharashtra, started with an aim is to provide you tailor made pandit services at very competitive and reasonable price. Our knowledgeable panel of experts will help you in resolving your worries and showering of divine blessings for smooth and tension free life. If you want a Pandit / Purohit / Priest / Poojari just give us a call and we will cater to your specific needs. Each and every customer needs are looked into and every customer gets a quality services according to their needs and budget.
